Sentencas: This work illustrates an innovative diagnostic technique able to improve fault isolability in Solid Oxide Fuel Cell (SOFC) energy conversion systems.
Titulo: A model-based diagnostic technique to enhance faults isolability in Solid Oxide Fuel Cell systems

Sentencas: On-board sensor reduction may induce fault clustering and, thus, hinder univocal fault isolation.
Titulo: A model-based diagnostic technique to enhance faults isolability in Solid Oxide Fuel Cell systems

Sentencas: According to the proposed technique, isolated system component sub-models, fed with faulty inputs, can be used to solve this issue.
Titulo: A model-based diagnostic technique to enhance faults isolability in Solid Oxide Fuel Cell systems

Sentencas: These models provide a set of redundant residuals, which react only if the related component is under faulty state.
Titulo: A model-based diagnostic technique to enhance faults isolability in Solid Oxide Fuel Cell systems

Sentencas: The technique is characterized and tested in simulated environment on an SOFC Anode Off-Gas Recycling (AOGR) system.
Titulo: A model-based diagnostic technique to enhance faults isolability in Solid Oxide Fuel Cell systems

Sentencas: Hydrogen external leakage, fuel and air heat exchangers efficiency reduction and recirculation unit malfunction are addressed and implemented in the complete system model.
Titulo: A model-based diagnostic technique to enhance faults isolability in Solid Oxide Fuel Cell systems

Sentencas: This latter is used to simulate system variables in both nominal and faulty conditions and compute residuals for fault detection and isolation.
Titulo: A model-based diagnostic technique to enhance faults isolability in Solid Oxide Fuel Cell systems

Sentencas: The sub-models are then used to introduce further residuals, and their behaviour is investigated at different fault magnitudes.
Titulo: A model-based diagnostic technique to enhance faults isolability in Solid Oxide Fuel Cell systems

Sentencas: The analysis is firstly performed in an ideal case scenario, considering the fault isolability that can be theoretically achieved.
Titulo: A model-based diagnostic technique to enhance faults isolability in Solid Oxide Fuel Cell systems

Sentencas: Then, practical application of the diagnostic algorithm is discussed, considering quantitative residuals deviation and properly analysing the effects of feeding the sub-models with inputs provided by both faulty and nominal models.
Titulo: A model-based diagnostic technique to enhance faults isolability in Solid Oxide Fuel Cell systems

Sentencas: The achieved results confirm the capability of the proposed approach to univocally isolate the considered faults in all the investigated conditions.
Titulo: A model-based diagnostic technique to enhance faults isolability in Solid Oxide Fuel Cell systems

Sentencas: Moreover, the analysis of the real case scenario proved the proposed algorithm suitable also for real applications.
Titulo: A model-based diagnostic technique to enhance faults isolability in Solid Oxide Fuel Cell systems
